attributes.action: Stop teaching unimportant math and focus on what is necessary and will be used
attributes.background: In lessons around half of the math children are taught will prove to make no difference to their future occupation. Instead of speeding through lessons trying to get through the curriculum , go at a slower pace learning more necessary math skills and making sure it is understood.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see to the maths curriculum.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
